finding: Product model has no product_name column
decision: Add product_name column as VARCHAR(200) nullable

finding: No unique constraint on Product table
decision: Add unique constraint on (ingredient_id brand product_name package_size package_unit)

finding: Products exported with brand as optional field

decision: Add product_name field after brand field

finding: display_name property builds from brand package_size package_type
decision: Insert product_name after brand in display format
